about.author: Author:
about.checkFailed: Failed to check for updates, please click here to check on the official website
about.checkUploadTip1: 1. If the deployment machine keeps failing to check when connected to the Internet, please check whether the time of the deployment machine is the standard time of any time zone.
about.checkUploadTip2:
2. Only supports checking whether there is a new version, and does not support online updates. 
Please be sure to check the update log and backup data before updating!
about.checkUploadTip3: 3. If you want to experience the beta version, please check it again
about.viewUpdateLog: Click here to view the update log

baseSettings.customFooterAlert: Due to framework security restrictions, executing code in the "<script></script>" tag is currently not supported.
baseSettings.iconMigrateDescribe: Icon styles have been migrated to group settings and support setting styles individually by group
baseSettings.netModeChangeButtonShow: Show the network environment switch button
baseSettings.resetAllStyleWarnText: Are you sure you want to reset all styles?
baseSettings.resetWarnText: Are you sure you want to reset all styles under this item?
baseSettings.searchBarSearchItem: Allow search bar to search items
baseSettings.uploadOrDragText: Click to upload or drag and drop into the box to replace the image

common.notFound: Sorry, the application failed to load. Please try refreshing the page or clearing the browser cache.

dockerManage.alertText: At present, only the operation and opening and closing of the container status of Docker's container is implemented. More advanced functions (creation, deletion ...) will decide whether to develop according to the needs of subsequent users.

exportImport.errorConfigFileFormat: The configuration file format is incorrect and cannot be imported
exportImport.errorConfigFileLow: The configuration file version is too low and cannot be compatible
exportImport.fileModified: The file has been modified, import with caution
exportImport.selectExportData: Select the configuration data to export
exportImport.selectImportData: Select the configuration data to import
exportImport.softwareVersionLow: The current software version may be too old and may not be compatible with this configuration file. It is recommended to update the software to the latest version before importing again.
exportImport.tip: Importing icon configuration data will not clear existing icon data, and exporting configuration will not export uploaded image icon files.
exportImport.warnConfigFileLow: The configuration file version is too low but compatible

globalSetting.customDangerAlert: This is a dangerous operation. Please do not fill in untrusted code. This may lead to privacy leaks, layout confusion, or attacks.
globalSetting.customJSAndCssAlert: If you do not have PRO authorization, you can enter the NAS or server where Sun-Panel is installed, find the "custom" path ({path}), modify and save the file directly, and it will still be effective.
globalSetting.iconChangeClearCache: After saving, clear the browser cache or restart the browser to see the effect.
globalSetting.resetWarnText: Are you sure you want to reset these data?
globalSetting.title: Site title

itemGroupManage.deleteWarnText: Are you sure you want to delete this group [{name}]? The application icons in this group will be lost after deletion.
itemGroupManage.onlyNameDescribe: The only name in English can be used with customized css, js, and footer to achieve richer styles.
itemGroupManage.textAutoColor: If the color is set to pure white (#FFFFFF), the text color will automatically adjust the black or white with the lightness of the background color of the card

openApi.alertText: Sun-Panel provides an open interface that can be used to add projects and other operations through development. For details, please refer to:
openApi.autoDomainWarning: The domain name here is automatically obtained. Please fill it in according to the actual situation during development.
openApi.updateTokenDialogText: Are you sure you want to continue? Token will become invalid if you continue to operate.

proAuth.hideProBadgeText: Hide all PRO feature badges and descriptions
proAuth.loginSunPanel: Log in to the Sun-Panel authorization platform
proAuth.serverError: An error occurred with the authorization server, please try again later.
proAuth.textDescription:
Since the author needs to make a living, some special features that are only available to Pro authorized users have been added to the project. 
If you are willing, you can purchase support through the authorization platform. This is not only recognition of the author's hard development, but also a source of motivation to encourage the author to continue exploring and add more exciting features. 
This support is entirely based on your volition. The author is fully aware of your generosity and trust. Therefore, even if more excellent Pro functions are added in the future, free functions will continue to be introduced, so stay tuned...❤️❤️❤️
proAuth.usernameWithPasswordIsNotEmpty: Account and password cannot be empty

uploadsFileManager.alertText: Here you can manage wallpapers and icons you have uploaded.
uploadsFileManager.copySuccess: Link copied successfully. You can paste it in the address bar.
uploadsFileManager.deleteWarningText: Cannot be recovered after deletion. Are you sure you want to continue?
uploadsFileManager.nothingText: You haven't uploaded any images yet.

common.deleteConfirmByName: Are you sure you want to delete {name}?

common.publicModeRestricted: This feature is restricted in public mode.

searchBox.iconUploadHint: It is recommended to use svg format for icon images, with a ratio of 1:1 recommended.
searchBox.noProAuth: Non-PRO authorization, in addition to the default search engine, you can only add up to 2 custom search engines
searchBox.openWithNewOpen: Search results open in new window
searchBox.urlKeywordhint: If the searched keyword is not at the end, you can use "%s" to indicate

iconItem.containerFormTip: After the container is updated, the container ID will become invalid and an exception reminder will appear. Just reselect the container.
iconItem.currentPageLayerOpen: Open in current page as layer

icon.iconOnlineTip:
Online icon: (This is a third-party icon library). You need to ensure that the device accessing the current page is connected to the Internet before it can be used. 
How to use: After entering the website, copy the desired icon name and paste it into the text box.
icon.iconSizeTip: Icon size: In order to make the icon style aesthetically pleasing, the ‘svg’ format icons in [Online Icon] mode and [Image] mode have been reduced in size, and icons in other formats are 100%.

iconItem.lanUrlInputPlaceholder: http(s):// (Intranet environment, will redirect to this address)
iconItem.onlyName: Unique identifier (English identifier, used as OpenAPI, corresponding field: 'onlyName')
iconItem.onlyNameExisted: The unique identifier is already occupied
iconItem.openPageAndStartContainer: Start the container before opening the page
iconItem.urlNoHttpStartWarn: Reminder: The link does not start with the standard "http://" or "https://". If it is correct, please ignore this reminder.
